derivation: from G5228 (ὑπέρακμος) and the base of G188 (ὑπέρακμος);
strongs_def: beyond the "acme", i.e. figuratively (of a daughter) past the bloom (prime) of youth
outline:
1. beyond the bloom or prime of life
  2. overripe, plump and ripe, (and so in a greater danger of defilement)
    1. of a virgin
